name: Outlook C2 Registry Key
description: Detects the modification of Outlook Security Setting to allow unprompted execution. Goes with win_outlook_c2_macro_creation.yml and is particularly interesting if both events occur near to each other.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:HKCU\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\16.0\\Outlook\\Security\\Level AND winlog.event_data.Details:*0x00000001*)`
